710148f-a.title: Manhattan: 8th Avenue - 31st Street (West)
710148f-a.text:
Eighth Ave. (white bridgelike structure in center) from West
31st (right of No. 2) to 33rd (left of No. 1) Streets, showing in
the foreground the site where the general Post Office stands today
(1938). Across the Avenue one sees the steel structural framework
for the Pennsylvania Railroad Station. These two photos form a
panoramic view eastward from a vantage point near Ninth Ave. and shows
a different skyline from what one sees today. Note Maoys at the left
and the Metropolitan Tower (under construotion) at the right.
May 1908.
George L. Balgue.

712011f-a.text:

About 1924.

710149f-b.title: Manhattan: 8th Avenue - 31st Street (West)
710149f-b.text:
Eiobth Avenue (immediate foreground, street level not
seenl and environs, rom W. 31st (intersection at left), to
A3rd (right) Streets, as viewed westward from the Equitable
Life Insurance Co. Building on Seventh Avenue,and showing the
quadrangular Post Office structure on thhe west side of this
thoroumfare and the railroad yards behind same. View 2
emmphasizes 'Nrd Street and includes in the foreground a corner
of the Pennsylvania Station. The 22 storv structure seen is
the Printing -rafte Building and is between 33rd arnd 34th Streets.
Note in the background the North (R0dson ) River and the Wersey
shoreline.
April 2, 1928.
Views 1a nd 2
P.L. Sperr

712012f-a.title: Manhattan: 31st Street - 8th Avenue
712012f-a.text:
(1)
The United States Post office, aain branch, 31st Street,
north side, at the N.W. corner of Eighth Avenue.
January 25, 1930.
P.L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing a little of the roods of the houses on the
south side of the street.
January 25, 1930.
P.L. Sperr.

724938f-a.title: Manhattan: 8th Avenue - 31st Street
724938f-a.text:
A rear view of the main branch of the United States Post Office,
Eighth Avenue, west side, from 31st to 32nd Streets, as seen from
the Pennsylvania Railroad yards.
January 25, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

710146f-a.title: Manhattan: 8th Avenue - 31st Street (West)
710146f-a.text:
Eighth Ave., north from but not including West 31st Street, showing
the General Post Office extending to West 33rd Street. On the right
appears (in part) the Pennsvlvania Railroad Station. Also shown (center)
is the 22-story Printing Crafts Building, at the N.W. corner of West
33rd, Street.
1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Writers Project.

712010f-a.text:

712008f-b.title: Manhattan: 31st Street - 8th Avenue
712008f-b.text:
(1)
31st Street, north side, from west of Eighth to but not
including Seventh Avenues, showing the roofs of the buildings
on the south side of the street. The view shows part of the
main branch of the Post Office and across the street is the
Pennsylvania Railroad Station.
January 25, 1930.
P.L. Sperr.
(2)
The 31st Street entrance to the Pennsylvania Station.
May 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
